entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
